name: The Events Calendar: oEmbed
author: Timothy Wood (@codearachnid)

sections.description:
Enable oEmbed functionality on your WordPress The Events Calendar plugin by Tri.be. This will create the ability to serve your events via oEmbed directly through http://{domain}/{event}/{slug}/oembed/ or http://{domain}/{events}/oembed/.

The service endpoint requires the url or id parameter for the event you are requesting to serve.

** known limitation with recurring events displaying **
sections.installation:
Install & Activate

Installing the plugin is easy. Just follow these steps:

  1. From the dashboard of your site, navigate to Plugins –> Add New.
  2. Select the Upload option and hit \”Choose File.\”
  3. When the popup appears select the tribe-events-oembed-x.x.zip file from your desktop. (The \’x.x\’ will change depending on the current version number).
  4. Follow the on-screen instructions and wait as the upload completes.
  5. When it\’s finished, activate the plugin via the prompt. A message will show confirming activation was successful.

That\’s it! Just configure your settings as you see fit, and you\’re on your way to creating events in style.
